FuncDef:
The binding interface command binds a FlexE physical interface to the FlexE Group.
The undo binding interface command unbinds the FlexE physical interface from the FlexE Group.
By default, no FlexE physical interface is bound to the FlexE Group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface type.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To bind a physical interface in FlexE mode in a FlexE Group, run the binding interface command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
